title: West Memphis 3 /// Part 2 ////// 41
description:
West Memphis 3 /// Part 2 ////// 41


TrueCrimeGarage.com


Part 2- Families, Pedophiles, Knives and Confessions

We pick up right where we had left off... This week we look into the timeline of the parents of each of the victims and their movements on the night and morning of the search for the boys. We discuss some police tips and we introduce Jessie Misskelley, Jason Baldwin and Damien Echols. We will also go through not one but three confessions.


Beer of the week - Elvis Juice by Brew Dog

Garage Grade - 4 out of 5 bottle caps

Beer Fund: https://truecrimegarage.com/home
author: truecrimegarage@gmail.com (TRUE CRIME GARAGE)
